name: Cards And Magic
description:
Story
You're a young prince who didn't have the patience to learn proper wizardry, so you can either cast a specific spell at random target, or a random spell at a specific target. (Well, you can cast it properly, but that drains all your concentration for the turn.)

Gameplay
Click on card to play it - it will affect a random monster or yourself!
Click on a monster to target it - a random spell from your hand will be cast at it.
Drag a spell to a monster - proper spell casting, but can only be done with the first spell of each turn, and you can't cast more spells.
Different spells/monsters have a different chance to be selected.

Known issues
- The balance is pretty much non-existent at the moment
